meanings.sent1: The chazzans sang beautifully during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: We listened to the chazzans' powerful voices echoing in the synagogue.
meanings.sent3: The chazzans decided to form a choir and surprise everyone.
meanings.sent4: The chazzans' harmonious melodies filled the room like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the chazzans' heartfelt performance.

meanings.definition: Chazzans: belonging to or relating to chazzans
meanings.sent1: She wore a chazzans robe for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The chazzans tradition has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent3: The chazzans-inspired decorations added a festive touch to the event.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the chazzans community was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The chazzans influence could be seen in every aspect of the celebration.
